home_slogan: Let’s build a strong, dynamic and caring community that uplifts each other.
home_lesser_slogan: Respect each other and feel the genuine connection.
home_sammy_walson: It definitely has been a great experiance connecting with my neighbors on LTN.
home_violet_jenning: LTN, definitely is the right place to find like-minded people around you.
home_andrew_fitzgerald: Had a lot of chances to connect with my community... Amazing  app!
features_title_meet_text: Find people in your neighbourhood and expand your network.
features_title_message_text: Filter nearby people by their age, gender and interests.
features_title_coupons_text: Get coupons from our sponsored places and pay less.
global_safety-text: For this important topic, we have collaborated with popular cafes and places all around of Istanbul so that our neighbours would be able to meet with each other without worries.
global_the_point_text: More than 264 million people suffer from depression worldwide and with quarantine, it was not getting any better. That’s why it’s so important for us to solve the problem of people feeling more and more isolated as time progresses. We care about you, and would like you to care about your neighbour so that, we could be a stronger community.
global_how_it_works: How does all of this work?
global_how_it_works_text: With the data that you provide in your profile, we are carefully filtering neighbours that you may want to meet and network with.
newsletter_subscribe: Signup to our newsletter to get a weekly digest.
meet_nearby: Meet nearby people with our cutting edge algorithms.
meet_info_text: After you have been matched with people near you, you can send them a message and meet up quickly !
neighbors_text: By clicking on “Invite to Meet” an email which includes your email address will be sent from our team to the invited neighbor and if they choose to meet, they will contact with you via email.
contactus_text: Help us create effective and active communities by communicating with us!
contactus_modal: The message was succesfully sent. We will get you back soon!
neighbors_alert_success: Your email has been successfully sent!
neighbors_alert_danger: A problem occured while sending your email...
